verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yah ye the LORD שִׁ֣ירוּ <WH7891> Shi-ru Sing לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> shir song חָדָ֑שׁ <WH2319> cha-Dash; a new תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8416> te-hil-la-To, [and] his praise בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> bik-Hal in the congregation חֲסִידִֽים׃ <WH2623> cha-si-Dim. of saints

יִשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> yis-Mach rejoice יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Let Israel בְּעֹשָׂ֑יו <WH6213> be-'o-Sav; in him that made בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- him let the children צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon, of Zion יָגִ֥ילוּ <WH1523> ya-Gi-lu be joyful בְמַלְכָּֽם׃ <WH4428> ve-mal-Kam. in their King

יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> ye-hal-Lu Let them praise שְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name בְמָח֑וֹל <WH4234> ve-ma-Chol; in the dance בְּתֹ֥ף <WH8596> be-Tof unto him with the timbrel וְ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> ve-chin-Nor, and harp יְזַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> ye-zam-me-ru- let them sing praises לֽוֹ׃ lo.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for רוֹצֶ֣ה <WH7521> ro-Tzeh taketh pleasure יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> be-'am-Mo; in his people יְפָאֵ֥ר <WH6286> ye-fa-'Er he will beautify עֲ֝נָוִ֗ים <WH6035> 'a-na-Vim, the meek בִּישׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH3444> bi-shu-'Ah. with salvation

יַעְלְז֣וּ <WH5937> ya'-le-Zu be joyful חֲסִידִ֣ים <WH2623> cha-si-Dim Let the saints בְּכָב֑וֹד <WH3519> be-cha-Vod; in glory יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <WH7442> ye-ran-ne-Nu, let them sing aloud עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4904> mish-ke-vo-Tam. upon their beds

רוֹמְמ֣וֹת <WH7319> rom-Mot [Let] the high אֵ֭ל <WH410> 'el [praises] of God בִּגְרוֹנָ֑ם <WH1627> big-ro-Nam; [be] in their mouth וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ve-Che-rev sword פִּֽיפִיּ֣וֹת <WH6374> pi-fi-Yot and a twoedged בְּיָדָֽם׃ <WH3027> be-ya-Dam. in their hand

לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot To execute נְ֭קָמָה <WH5360> Ne-ka-mah vengeance בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim; upon the heathen תּֽ֝וֹכֵחֹ֗ת <WH8433> to-che-Chot, [and] punishments בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest אֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> 'um-Mim. upon the people

לֶאְסֹ֣ר <WH631> le'-Sor To bind מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4428> mal-chei-Hem their kings בְּזִקִּ֑ים <WH2131> be-zik-Kim; with chains וְ֝נִכְבְּדֵיהֶ֗ם <WH3513> ve-nich-be-dei-Hem, and their nobles בְּכַבְלֵ֥י <WH3525> be-chav-Lei with fetters בַרְזֶֽל׃ <WH1270> var-Zel. of iron

לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot To execute בָּהֶ֨ם׀ ba-Hem מִשְׁפָּ֬ט <WH4941> mish-Pat upon them the judgment כָּת֗וּב <WH3789> ka-Tuv, written הָדָ֣ר <WH1926> ha-Dar this honour ה֭וּא <WH1931> hu This לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol for all חֲסִידָ֗יו <WH2623> cha-si-Dav, have all his saints הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
